help-file.title: "GOD, INROOM"
help-file.content:
"Inroom" lets you affect an entire room with a command that normally would only affect one person.
<string> should contain 1 occurrence of ONE of the following:
%p -all players in the room %m -all mobs in the room %a -both mobs and players in the room
Example: inroom teleport %p 19617 (Teleports everyone in the room to room 19617). Example: inroom force %m report (Forces all mobs in the room to report).
